original_text: And if any beast, of which ye may eat, die; he that toucheth the carcase thereof shall be unclean until the even.
korean_text: 너희가 먹을 만한 짐승이 죽은 때에 그 주검을 만지는 자는 저녁까지 부정할 것이며

sentences.original_text: And if any beast, of which ye may eat, die;
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 너희가 먹을 수 있는 어떤 짐승이 죽으면;

sentences.original_text: he that toucheth the carcase thereof
shall be unclean until the even.
